Reviews.Title: Great picture: colors, clarity, contrast, brightness delightful. 3D is awesome
Reviews.Author: austin_Larry
Reviews.Content: Our oldest TV went out and I was looking for a replacement. I LOVE 3D in theaters. I always have from IMAX to recent studio releases. I have a PS3 3D monitor which is small, but I love the 3D, and my must have was 3D in a replacement TV. I had never owned a Vizio before but had heard very positive reviews of them, especially the value you get.The 50 inch version of this checked everything I was looking for: good manufacturer, price, good reviews, 3D. The TV box arrived in an outer box very well packed. The stand did require 2 people and one to be on the ground cradling the set as the other worked to secure it. It was awkward and I do not see how one person could possibly do it.Appearance wise for the TV the first thing you notice is how thin the bezel is. One of the thinnest I have seen. I didn't think this would be that big a deal but it is nice when viewing not to have too much black around the picture. Speaking of the picture. Right out of the box without any adjustments it was just plain beautiful. Details on some of the kids programs we watch quite frequently brought out new textures and shades I hadn't noticed. I tweaked the brightness a little but found the stock settings great for everything I have watched so far.The 3D has exceeded my expectations. I love passive 3D. The pictures have been clean and clear and the quality of 3D is theater level. I have watched the extended edition Hobbit and Star Trek Into Darkness. The best home viewing experiences, by far, I have ever had. My PS3 is active 3D and it has lots of lighting issues and the glasses need to be recharged. Passive is much brighter and simpler with very cheap glasses.3D is available from Netflix. I have watched some Red Bull documentaries that were spell binding. If you use cable  like me and have the TV not where an Ethernet is available you might want to consider a coax to Ethernet adapter product because 3D takes up a LOT of bandwidth.I have a smart Blu-Ray player so don't use the smart apps. But if this is going on a room in the house without that then the apps can be very useful. I have tried them and they work well but connected wirelessly, which was very simple to do, quality will depend on your connection strength. There are a wide range of apps that are simple to access and add more versatility, if needed, to the TV.As my first Vizio I am very pleased. TVs seem to be priced like audio. You can get really good audio at a reasonable price and then exceptional audio at a very steep price. There are diminishing returns and the quality improvements get steeper and steeper in price. I feel almost everyone would be more than pleased with this TV. Especially if you want 3D. Vizio seems to essentially price their TVs at Black Friday prices all the time, that is the value they give you. Very few compromises here for the price. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly pleased with my 1st Vizio - Excellent 3D experience - Great Smart TV features and Control
Reviews.Author: Larry Twain "Digital Evangelist"
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV for this price point! I was searching up and down, all over the place, for a Passive 3D + Smart LED TV, >50" in size.Most Smart TV for 50" already price around $600-$700 during the time. And I fell on this one through Amazon's search and found it with 10% discount! and with 3D!My original choice was LG, but I found Vizio is very comparable. The software of the Smart features are great, easy to control, and you can also get an optional keyboard remote made by Vizio to control the TV (Search ASIN: B009IHHQUS).My first 3D clip on this TV, that you might surprise - is from Youtube. While I received the TV I have no 3D movie to play with, so I used the Smart TV option, and used Youtube that I found quite a lot's of 3D footage available. There are a few Youtube clips that are just to test your 3D TV so you can literally feel the objects like coming out from your TV, REAL! It was fun to see my little ones move backward when the person on the clip was pointing a stick out, like getting closer to your face. Later when he draw a knife, they ran away!The 3D viewing was pleasant and enjoyable. My 7 and 5 years old immediately fell in love. Our first movie was Despicable Me, and we can't wait for more and I was asked to get more and I got a few more from Amazon used selections. My son is in love with sea animals, so I got "IMAX: Under the Sea 3D" (B00447G2O8) for him and he is watching it over and over again. My daughter was like "I thought we watched this in Disney World". They are able to relate the experience with the 3D/4D shows in the theme park.The only drawback is the size, that it is thicker than those that price higher, but I have already realize that given to this price point. For less than Seven Hundred point, you can't beat it especially for one with 3D, and it is so hard to see a 3D TV go on sales, they just don't. Today I was in Sam's club the same Vizio WITHOUT 3D, is selling for the same price too!If you are just looking for a pure Smart TV without 3D, you have a lot others to choose. For a 3D + Smart + >50", can't go wrong with this. If you have a growing family like me with little children, 3D TV is a must go. I have had many of my children's friends invited for a movie night and they LOVE the 3D experience.

Reviews.Title: First Impressions
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "JMA"
Reviews.Content: The TV just got here today, but since there weren't other reviews of it, I figured I would say something.First, it's not too heavy, particularly not if you're only now upgrading from a cathode TV. It's definitely lighter and easier to handle than our old 19-inch cathode tube TV was. It's still best if you have two people to maneuver it, but I was able to get it onto its stand and onto the shelf myself, and I am not particularly strong.Physical set-up was fairly simple: Fasten a few screws, make sure the base doesn't wiggle, and then arrange on the stand. The TV is stable enough that I don't mind having it on a stand against the wall, although I may still switch to a stand with a mount for the TV if I get nervous about someone bumping into it. Our cats jumped onto the shelf to see what I was doing, and jumped off in terror when I turned it on, and the TV didn't even wiggle.Before mounting it on the wall or stand, it's probably wise to insert the various cords. I used an ethernet cable and one HDMI cable; there are several other options, but I haven't had need of them so far. Then plug everything in, put the batteries in the remote, grab a pair of 3d glasses, and sit in a comfortable chair.When you turn it on, the set-up is pretty straightforward. The included paper manual gets you just about this far, and then sends you to the electronic manual on the TV. That's probably a good option once you're used to the TV, but if you're the type who likes to read the manual cover to cover before you begin, you may want to download a copy and have it available for when you're clicking through the options.The remote has shortcut buttons for Amazon Instant, Netflix, and M-Go (although when I clicked on the M-Go button, the app just said "coming soon.") You can also hit the Vizio logo button below the number pad and scroll through a variety of other apps, or add more from their app store. The range of apps available works well for what we use (for music and radio, for instance, it has Pandora, Rhapsody, iHeartRadio, and TuneIn Radio, and possibly a few others that I didn't notice). It also has an app for HuluPlus, along with apps to the usual video sources.It's kind of a pain to browse through the various apps in the store, because each time you add one, it sends you back to the beginning. Fortunately, you probably won't need to do that very often.Even though our particular TV is set up facing some windows, I was able to watch during daylight without the glare being distracting. I would recommend setting it up out of direct light, or else hanging dark curtains, but if that's not an option, it should still be fine.The picture quality was good--not too grainy, and not blurry. I watched parts of several 3d videos via Netflix and YouTube, and the picture quality was surprisingly crisp, without jerkiness or blurriness.The sound is good, but my standards are fairly low so I make no promises that someone with more sophisticated preferences would like it equally well. But then, if someone has more sophisticated sound preferences, they probably are going to invest in separate speakers.So far, we're very happy with the television. The price was right, and the quality seems good.

Reviews.Title: Despite a major failure, within three weeks of purchase, I still rate it, best in show, for price!
Reviews.Author: John Ratchford ""war baby""
Reviews.Content: It,s a great TV, but, three weeks in, it quit! Had to wait for over a week, for service, watching a 19 inch TV,Both of the circuit boards had to be replaced, aside from that, the TV is a great set, color is phenomenal, sound is amazing for such small speakers, and the resolution, is every bit as good as the more expensive sets.

Reviews.Title: Amazing for the Price
Reviews.Author: Nole67
Reviews.Content: We have five Vizio televisions in our home and I doubt I would ever buy anything else.  This one has all the features anyone could want except a major home theater buff. The 3 D is amazing and I much prefer the inexpensive movie glasses as we have kids who lose and break things like crazy.  I don't think the quality on the others I have seen to be much if any better and then you have another expense constantly replacing.Easy set up even for this grandma (not all the wires as I let the teen do that) but setting up network and preferred settings is a breeze.  The only negative is they send you a remote without the qwerty keyboard. I had an extra so we used that and you can pick them up for about $15 including shipping on Amazon.  I usually build a couple extras ahead of time to have for damaged or lost ones. Even with the fast Amazon shipping they would be lost with even a day without a remote.  I ordered on a Saturday and got it Monday for only $15.99 shipping- great job Amazon!  My recommendation is to get a Square Trade extended warranty. They are the best. The reason I had to get another tv is Walmart botched my extended warranty purchase on the one that had issues and I have found from experience over the last two years Square Trade are cheaper, much more reliable/timely and they do what they say will do up front which the others I purchased did not.

Reviews.Title: Best deal out there
Reviews.Author: edson
Reviews.Content: Unbeatable price, free shipping, fast deliveryAbout the tv ..... Good colors, sharp image, slim frame which gives you the feeling that you have a larger screen to view.Reason for the 4 star rating is that its webbrowser does not support flash ohterwise it could easily get a 10 star rating, for anything else that doe not require flash it does a very good job and by that i mean streaming videos off websites most of the times require flash.Also when using the remote you should slightly aim towards the bottom left corner of the tv because of the little awkward positioning of the remote sensor/receiver on the tv.Viewing movies, playing music or pictures load easily through the usb input just like a PC.Using the onscreen keyboard takes a little getting used to but the option to bookmark the websites reduces the times you have to input/type all the adresses again.The sound is very good compared to other tv's but it surely wont be better then a hometheatre set.Apps work great and are many more to download.Installation is a breeze...internet i only connect through wifi and no complaints about speed.Planning on buying a 32" too.Oh, did i mentioned that it has 3D?? 3D movies are very pleasant to watch, like all of it is happening just in your living room....after 2months of use i still stand by the above mentioned facts...adding some more...2D to 3D converter works just fine..most depends on quality of 2D video..netflix works great..truly happy with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Great affordable 3D Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Rusty Shackleford "Dale"
Reviews.Content: I just got the Vizio 50 inch 3D Smart TV and love it. For anyone else interested in 3DTV like myself, this is a good way to get started. You will need a 3D Blu-ray disc player, an HDMI connector, a 3D TV, and Theater 3D glasses(The Vizio E500d comes with two sets).These are the passive glasses just like at the theater, they're lightweight, cheap, and don't need to be charged.The Vizio has a super clear picture with a two million to one contrast ratio and 120 Hz refresh rate. Even regular DVD's and network broadcasts look better on this set, and I'm seeing details on Wii U and XBox games that I never noticed before.  Of course the best picture comes from 3D Blu-ray discs. So far I've seen The Hobbit and Dredd 3D discs and both movies looked amazing. For instance in The Hobbit when Bilbo runs through the shire and the camera pulls back, you see the entire Hobbit village in great depth and detail.The TV set itself looks sleek with a slim frame, it's also easy to move at around thirty pounds and less than forty five inches wide.Set-up is easy if you have a wireless connection. Within a half hour of unpacking the TV and attaching the base I was watching "Thor" on Amazon Prime without needing to physically connect anything but the power plug! Another neat feature for those with Amazon Prime or Netflix, there are dedicated buttons on the remote for those services.With the price of most products going up, I am thrilled with this feature packed yet very attractively priced set.  Happy viewing.

Reviews.Title: Wow... Nice TV !
Reviews.Author: Joseph Micka
Reviews.Content: Wow, its a nice TV.... picture is way better then my main HDTV that was purchased for over three thousands about 6 years ago. best price to for a 50 inch smart tv with 3D.... a friend of mine has a new 50 inch Samsung tv and the pictures quality is the same and he spent three hundred more then I did.

Reviews.Title: Awesome 3D
Reviews.Author: T. L. Robinson "lildoe"
Reviews.Content: 3rd Vizio tv. The 3D on this size better than 32 inch.  Sound work's much better than I expected.  Yes I would recomend  this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, sound and Internet apps in one sweet package!
Reviews.Author: Ellwood Richard Hood
Reviews.Content: We considered a number of 47-50 inch LED TVs before deciding on this one and were not particularly interested in the 3D feature, but the features and pricing on this one definitely sold us. Setup was a breeze and it recognized our wireless router immediately. However, that connection was too slow for good streaming so I used the hard wired Internet connection which is built in to this set. It performs wonderfully. I have another Vizio HDTV in which I was disappointed with the sound and purchased a separate sound bar, but the sound in this one is more than adequate.One minor limitation on this set is it has limited old style connections - mostly HDMI inputs - so connecting older equipment to it requires making choices or changing connections. Here I am talking about VHS players and older CD players that don't have HDMI connections.In summary a great TV with all needed features and a great buy from Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Woweee wow wow wow!!
Reviews.Author: stephen revan
Reviews.Content: This tv is super great!  Got it last Thursday and had it set up to view the NBA finals and the picture quality is just superb.  The Internet apps are cool too. Watched Netflix a bit. Bt the 3D. That's the killer. Was like being in the movies really clean ! Had me jumping and ducking a couple times. 5 stars all the way vizio. Really really really happy with this purchase. And I downloaded jack the giant slayer to a USB stick and watched it in 3D. Wow awesome. It really can work from a USB drive through the USB slot. Love it.

Reviews.Title: One of the best LEDs for the money
Reviews.Author: Sam "Gizmo Fan"
Reviews.Content: Vizio is panned by a lot of reviewers but I must say I watched the picture next to other TVs from Samsung, LG, Panasonic (Plasma, which I own 2) and by far this TV provided a brighter picture and more accurate colors. This at a cost diff. from a few hundred to almost double. The 3D, color, contrast is awesome on this TV plus it is a smart TV to boot.It also has a stereo output which I use to connect my wireless headset for night watching, which the expensive LGs and Samsung don't have. They may have a headset jack but first you have to manually plugin your headset and then when you plugin something over there the speakers go mute. I leave my headsets connected and sometimes I may have them on while there may be others in the room listening through the tv speakers else I put the tv speakers on mute. This works very well on this TV as it does on my 5yr old Panasonic Plasma. Very few tv's carry this feature nowadays and you don't realize it's value unless you are missing it.It has a thin bezel and though it is not as thin as their edge lit razor line or other similar TVs, I actually wanted a backlit LED TV for better contrast and less flashlight effects. I couldn't have been happier with the purchase. Take away 1 star for no qwerty remote keyboard, no PC input (most PCs can output HDMI anyways), no 2D to 3D conversion and cannot control extent of the 3D effect, but none of them were a deal breaker for me.

Reviews.Title: TV rules, remote control drools
Reviews.Author: Michael Miller
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is nothing short of glorious. I was replacing a low resolution, 54-inch rear projection TV. With a TV stand, this fit perfectly into the existing entertainment center (shelves on the side and over the TV) and brings so many new features. It's WiFi internet access spared me the trouble of running a cable awkwardly across a hallway. Its Netflix and YouTube apps are perfect for my needs, and I've made some use of the YouTube weather and movie notices. It makes great use of HD cable channels; seeing them on a TV this big is a revelation. The cost was about the best in the class of 50-ish HD LCD TVs. Everything about this TV is great except...The remote control.Wow, this thing drives me nuts. I don't know if it's the location of the receiver on the TV or the remote or something in between, but reception is horrible. I often have a command two or three times to get the TV to respond (and, yes, I pause between button-mashing to see if the first button push worked). It takes several tries to get the volume to respond, several tries to get the Netflix movie controls to work ("Ha-ha, you wanted pause THEN? No, you get a pause after the cool scene in the movie!"), and several tries to switch between inputs.The last TV, that dated rear-projection, 20th Century monster, could see remote control signals bounced off all the white-painted walls in the family room. So could my cheap little college CRT TV - I could point the remotes 180 degrees away from the TV and get a quick, snappy response. This modern thing needs you to adopt weird yoga poses before it refers your remote control commands to a committee for consideration.All that falls under the category of "first world problems," hence the 4 stars. The TV is great. The picture is great. The features are great. For a 50" HD LCD LED TV, the cost was great. It just seems insensitive to the remote control.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: mpowers20
Reviews.Content: So far we love it! We haven't had any problems yet but then again, we've only had it for a week. The picture is great and the sound is, too! We tried the 3D not knowing what to expect because we've never seen a 3D movie and it was pretty cool. More in depth then coming out at you but I wasn't expecting too much since it's a TV rather than a theater. All-in-all, we love it and it was a great buy!

Reviews.Title: the best priced TV I could find
Reviews.Author: Timdog Graves
Reviews.Content: the TV was delivered to the house in record time. 3 little bolts to install the stand, plugged in the HDMI cable and that's basically all you have to do.,There's nothing to complain about wih tv...I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome value.
Reviews.Author: Thunderlizard
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv to replace a Toshiba 50" rear projection that has given good service and good picture for almost 10 years. I have a Vizio 40" in my bedroom, also 120hz, and the picture is superb. I found this to be a good deal, and ive not been disappointed. The picture is excellent. Contrary to another review, viewing angle is very good!  Sound quality is ok, but at least as good as i would expect from such a slim tv.Wireless internet connection is extremely fast, and videos load and play with almost no buffering lag.I havent tried 3D yet, but i am very impressed with the overall quality and the picture this tv delivers. I was also pleasantly surprised to see how low the power consumption is for such a large set. Very nice.

Reviews.Title: net flix 3d is great
Reviews.Author: andy "andria"
Reviews.Content: This 50 inch is replaceing my Phillips 50" plazma. I'm very happy with it so far,but its only been a week since i had it. I will update again in the coming months. I didn't give it 5 stars only because after calling text support i found out that Vizio televisions cannot receive a 3D movie yet from Net Flix. You can watch it in 2D but not in 3D, and this is only with Net Flix. . Vudu 3D downloads work great,and the 3D is very good.  Net Flex 3d movies now play on my TV. Their system has been updated. 11/10/13.

Reviews.Title: Best TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: JPD
Reviews.Content: I just bought this TV a few days ago, and I must say....I am very happy with my purchase! First off, the delivery was fast and on time. I bought the TV on a Sunday and it was delivered on the following Wednesday afternoon. Couldn't have been happier with the shipping. Second....The installation was super easy! Setting up the TV wasn't hard at all. Literally, all I did was unplug my old 42" VIZIO and plugged in my new 50" into my home theater system, PS3, and my DISH and it all worked right away!The 3D on this TV is awesome! Also, picture quality is clean and crisp. I watched, "The Hobbit" in 3D, and I will admit, there were a few scenes that made me flinch.I'm not going to comment a whole lot on the internet only because there a different kinds of internet options. I have high speed internet and connecting to Hulu, Netflix, or to just browse the internet, is quick and painless. I don't even need to use my laptop anymore.

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD PURCHASE!
Reviews.Author: Jimmer Wiley
Reviews.Content: i did a lot of research before i bought this tv, and i wish i wouldve bought it sooner. one of the recurring issues i seen people post were about the slow APPS the tv offers. i didn't care too much about that because i had to buy a 3d blu-ray player which had plenty of apps also. but, the tv apps woork jus fine. they are fast and always seem to be running smooth and in great quality. i mostly use netflix, amazon instant video, and pandora.3D- the 3d quality is great, i only watched a few movies 3d so far but it definitley makes it better. things arent always popping out to your face, but there is a noticable 3rd dimension to everything. im sure there are better 3d tvs out there that are constantly making you reach out to touch things but those are probably double the price of this.QUALITY- picture quality is great. it makes even old classic movies pop. (ghostbusters was a fun one to watch) i use it alot for Xbox and the graphics look incredible. no blurring or laggy shots, very smooth and easy for the eye.FINALLY, for this price, this could be one of the best deals on amazon! i recommend this product to anyone and even if this tv was $150 more i wouldve considered buying it, but it being this cheap i felt i would be dumb if i didnt. dont spend over $1000 on a tv from samsung or sony, this is jus as good and saves u a lot of money. hope this helps

Reviews.Title: Great value! Very good picture quality!
Reviews.Author: rk "rk"
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV for the price! I enjoy the Amazon and Netflix on your fingertips! The colors are vibrant and natural.

Reviews.Title: 50" Visio 3d SmartTV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: A great TV for a great price.  I'm very impressed with the quality of the pic.  Plug and play for the PS3 and set up of the Smart TV function was a breeze.  I was more than pleased with my purchase.  Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Stacy
Reviews.Content: Great tv with a ton of features and the 120hz really makes the 3D movies pop. If you are looking for a 3D tv with a lot of built in features and perfect picture than this is the tv for you. Everything looks great on it from the cable tv to video games to 3D Bluray movies. I really love this product and being a former Sony only person, I switched to Vizio about 3 years ago and now own 2 Vizio brand TV's and would never trade them or go back to any other brand. There is also none of that motion blur that can sometimes happen during fast action scenes either from a movie or video game.

Reviews.Title: Man's Dream
Reviews.Author: Tony Owens
Reviews.Content: I finally convinced my wife to breakdown and go 3D...after having this TV for over a month now, she loves it as much as I do! FANTASTIC

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price... Remote SUCKS.
Reviews.Author: r lib
Reviews.Content: Received the TV earlier this week and have been able to use and test several apps, HD TV, 3D movies and gaming.Apps - All of the apps work great. Easy to set up and streaming is clear and crisp.TV - Looks great, amazing picture and very little glare compared to coming from a Samsung Plasma.3D - I love the passive 3d this TV has. Coming from active 3d I thought for sure it wouldn't look as good, have crappy viewing angles or something along those lines, but after watching a couple of movies I actually like passive better. No clunky glasses and I don't have to spend an extra 50-100 bucks per pair to enable everyone to watch. Only thing I miss is the 2d-3d "up conversion".Gaming - Games look just as good on this TV to me as they did on my plasma. Blacks are a little less dark, but unless you're an uber videophile nerd, it's not worth the extra money.Cons -Youtube app is pretty crappy unless you run it from your phone.The remote is TERRIBLE. You have to have it pointed directly at the sensor almost (though that could be the sensor) and the dedicated amazon button doesn't work. I have to hit the Vizio button and scroll to the amazon app to run the video. This is a big deal for me as I use Prime a LOT more than I do Netflix. The button worked once initially and hasn't worked since.Documentation is CRAP. I am a fan of the digital world, but good God, you need to include something explaining how to use the remote and go through basic setup. It's not as straight forward as some other brands out there, especially since it requires you to create an account to do -anything- including watch basic TV.Vizio's support site is severely lacking, which is a big deal for me considering how poor my experience was with my Samsung and it dying after only two years. When I try to register the TV they don't even list this model on their site despite it being released THIS YEAR. Thankfully I learned my lesson and bought a Squaretrade warranty so it shouldn't be a big deal...Except I had to list the TV as "other" and enter the model number as Squaretrade doesn't have it listed either. Kind of worrying.-- Conclusion --TV is definitely worth the price, just be sure you get the extended warranty as I don't have any faith in Vizio's support.

Reviews.Title: Great picture on the cheap
Reviews.Author: mike senior
Reviews.Content: I also own a 47" 3D Vizio. Neither the 47" nor the 50" have all the bells and whistles of the much more expensive brands, I don't want to have to be a technical genius to turn on my TV I just want to be entertained. The guided setup was a breeze and my connection is wireless to both TVs. I would highly recommend this.

Reviews.Title: This is a Beautiful piece of technology!
Reviews.Author: A. C. Doyle "Sniperbait1966"
Reviews.Content: I would give this TV ten stars if I could. It is a beauty! VIZIO has my vote! Simple to use, intuitive menus and software make this a technological masterpiece! Coupled with my Panasonic 3D BluRay disc player that turns ALL of my collection of DVDs AND BluRay Discs into THREE DEE DISCS!!!! Makes me one VERY happy Camper! I am NOW able to re-watch each and every one of my FAVORITE FILMS IN 3D!!!! How AWESOME is that? 67 years old, A former Marine, a Gamer, former Game Designer, Actor, A current Father, Grandfather, and now able to enjoy life even more because of the simple acquisition of two pieces of tech! A 3D TV, and a 3D disc player!! Combined with my Toshiba DVD Recorder, I can now Record to DVD ALL my favorite Shows, like Doctor Who, Bones, Sleepy Hollow, Almost Human, Etc. Etc, Etc, AND WATCH THEM IN 3D!! Be smart, buy S-Mart! Well... You know what I mean. Oh, let's not forget my PS3, 3D video games!!!! Semper Fidelis folks. Got it Covered!When it WORKS, Tech is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: First week of use
Reviews.Author: JessM6287
Reviews.Content: So far, the TV is great.  We haven't taken advantage of the 3D aspect or any HD programs.  However, the basic displays are amazing.  I love all the apps on the TV (which are great with our AppleTV).One thing I would recommend - order additional 3D glasses.  We had thought about having guests and watching 3D movies, but the box only has 2.

Reviews.Title: Awesome television, and 3D, and a great price.  Highly recommended.
Reviews.Author: FrequentFred
Reviews.Content: This is the second VIzio 3D tv I've purchased and I love this TV.  It is so inexpensive but deliver as good as quality as those much more expensive.Only complaint I have, and same with my smaller 3D Vizio, the Truesound (I think that's what it is called) for some movies or TV shows makes the sound go in and out.  For our smaller version, we just turn it off if it's doing it for a show (it doesn't sound as good though with it off).  But for this one, we bought a Vizio soundbar from Walmart for $100 and that fixes the problem and makes it sound that much better anyway.Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great TV with minor quirks
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: I really like this television.  When I purchased this TV from Amazon, I got an amazing deal.  Based on the price, it was a steal.  At Amazon's current listed price ($739 as of 12/10/13), I'm not so sure that it's as great of a deal as what I got.  But as far as the product itself, it's a good television.  The picture is great and it's as good (and better in some cases) as some of the big name televisions, but for a fraction of the price.  I generally purchase Samsung televisions, but after a good experience with this television, I have no qualms with buying another Vizio in the future.I only have a couple gripes.  First, the remote.  The remote is garbage.  It feels flimsy.  For an television of this caliber, I'd expect a more sturdy and reliable remote.  Also, I experience delays when I attempt to do something as simple as increasing the volume.  It seems like I have to press the volume button a couple times to "wake it up", at which time it functions normally.  It's not a battery issue either.  Also, the Vizio button functions as the menu button for the smart TV functions such as accessing Netflix, Hulu, etc.  Often times I have to press the Vizo button twice to get it to execute the smart menu.  The only other complaint I can think of is the television sometimes reboots for seemingly no reason.  There's been occasions when I'm doing something simple like changing the input and I'm greeted with the Vizio logo which implies the television has just started.  I haven't discovered a reason for this yet.Overall, for the price and for what you get with that price, I'd have no hesitation buying this again even with it's quirks.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: S. Jamison
Reviews.Content: I got the 50" version. The screen is really good. Lots of settings to setup the picture quality, more so than I have seen in any other tv. Its got an awesome picture, once you get it setup right. Definitely make sure to play with the picture colors and brightness to find what works best for you in your environment. The only thing holding this back from 5 stars was the speakers and having a 240hz refresh rate, however the 120hz seems to be working well in fast action scenes I have tested out. Speakers are little weak, had to turn the bass all the way up, and the treble way down. It sounds a lot better, but still not as good as my old TV. They do sell a neat sound bar that supposedly works awesome with this. Would definitely recommend this TV as  one to get. All the smart features, and wifi, and wired internet, plus 3d! Cant beat the price at all on this one!

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: J. Crawford
Reviews.Content: The only thing I don't like there is a high pitch sound whin you change the Chanel. Outside of this, this thing is bigger than I thought! Yeh!

Reviews.Title: Best value for money..
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: I am super liking this TV. Very easy to set up, just plug in, follow some damn simple steps, configuring internet and all, started working immediately.3d viewing is awesome, I am currently watching 3d movies from netflix and the experience is awesome. Big screen, sound is good, frankly speaking I could not find any negative about this TV so far (I purchased from amazon few weeks back). Internet if flawless, installed youtube widget, so most of the videos are available directly on TV , no need to connect laptop.Would surely like to recommend this TV to everyone !

Reviews.Title: Best deal and picture you will find
Reviews.Author: Bruce
Reviews.Content: Great picture with easy set up.  I was not even challenged when setting this tv up.  So easy a three year old could set up!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!
Reviews.Author: S. M. Liddy "NYL Girl"
Reviews.Content: We love this TV! The size is perfect and the picture is gorgeous! The 3D movies look absolutely amazing! The first time we watched one, it was Despicable Me 2. My kids tried to jump up and touch things in the movie they were so real looking!

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: David Welch
Reviews.Content: i love this hanging on my wall. picture is great the smart tv functions work well although i tend to stick with ps4 for amazon and netflix. only down fall is typing with the remote is less than easy. well worth every penny

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Roy
Reviews.Content: Great TV love being able to get on the internet with this definitely would recommend.Able to use the apps for YouTube movie apps that's great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Cute Toast
Reviews.Content: I got this on a great deal, so I wasn't sure if it would perform as advertised.  Thankfully it does.  The picture is great, 3D works really well (all though you do need to turn the lights off for it to really pop).  The smart tv features work okay, but I use my ps3 and android box for all of my streaming just because their user interfaces are nicer.  The sound is pretty good for an LED, but I eventually added a soundbar.  I couldn't recommend this tv more.

Reviews.Title: SELL USE PRODUCTS AS NEW
Reviews.Author: Damarilis Rivera
Reviews.Content: CONNECT BUY SOLD ME A USED TV THEY BROUGHT FROM SAMS CLUB AND INSIST IT WAS NEW. THEY TV WORKED FINE FOR ABOUT A MONTH AFTER A MONTH THE TV HAD A DISCOLORED STRIP THAT WENT FROM THE TOP OF THE TV TO THE BOTTOM OF THE TV ABOUT 6 INCHES LONG. I AM A PROCRASINATOR SO I DID NOT BRING IT TO CONNECTS BUY ATTENION TILL AFTER THE 30 DAY RETURN POLICY AND 90 WARRENTY I WILL TAKE ACCOUNTABLILTY FOR THAT I HAVE NO PROBLEM TAKING ACCOUNTABILTY FOR WHAT I DO WRONG OR BEING HONEST ABOUT THINGS. I HAVE HAD THE TV FOR LESS THEN 6 MONTHS SO WHEN I CALLED VIZO BECAUSE THEIR NEW PRODUCTS ARE COVERED UNDER A ONE YEAR MANUFACTURE WARRENTY AND THEY WERE WILLING TO FIX OR REPLACE THE TV TILL THEY FOUND OUT BY THE SEIRAL # ON THE TV THAT IT WAS ORGINALY SOLD TO SAMS CLUB SO WHEN CONNECT BY BROUGHT IT AND SOLD IT TO ME IT WAS NO LONGER CONSIDER A NEW TV AND WAS NOT COVERED UNDER VIZIO ONE YEAR MANUFACTURES WARRENTY SO I BROUGHT THIS TO CONNECT BY ATTENTION THIS IS WHAT THEY EMAILED MESorry to hear that.Returns are within 30 days onlyThis item is past our warranty of 90 days.We sell only brand new items. Any other problems with the item must be reported with in 30 days from the time of delivery.Thank you,SmI JUST WANT TO GIVE BUYERS A HEADS UP I AM NOT SOMEONE WITH A LOT OF MONEY THATS WHY I USED AMAZON TO BUY THE TV TRY TO SAVE SOME MONEY I GUESS SHAME ON ME LESSON LEARNED. HOPEFULLY NEW BUYS CAN LEARN.

Reviews.Title: nice for 90 days
Reviews.Author: dave
Reviews.Content: worked great for just over 90 days. now when you are watching netflix or any other app it just for no reason clicks off and goes to local tv broadcast. then you have to go back to your apps and find what you where watching and start again. called chinamart and since it has been over 90 days i am stuck with it. almost 800.00 on a chinamart charge thrown out the window. i will never step foot in chinamart (wallmart)again. glad i waited to give my review.

Reviews.Title: Netflix cuts out after a few minutes.
Reviews.Author: Davis L.
Reviews.Content: I know I rated it with five stars and it is a great TV but if you use Wi-Fi for the apps you need to know that you should have the router as close as you can to the TV. My Netflix would freeze up or say it could not reach the server after eight minutes and I would restart it and go another eight minutes. The connection would show as a good solid five bars but I could not fix the problem until I moved the router closer to the TV. I had the router next to the computer in another room. It was driving me crazy because it was showing a good signal but it must have been dropping data from the distance. You can always hook up the Ethernet cable to your TV too. Awesome TV but just giving  heads up since Vizio would say to call Netflix and the other way around.

Reviews.Title: Mixed feelings mostly good
Reviews.Author: Mars Trader
Reviews.Content: ProsExcellent image.Remote and settings are all very logical.Easy access to the input selector and like the ability to create custom labels.The Youtube app is well designed and has most of the features.Analog outputs were a requirement for my purposes, and have several settings options that I like.ConsNo RGB (but that's minor)The Amazon launch does not work consistently - seems to be a problem with the app in the TV.The Amazon app is terrible. It does not display my watch list or other personalizations.I don't like being forced to have dedicated mGO and Amazon buttons.The USB port is always powered on. I prefer to have it switched.The pilot light is a joke, barely visible - I had to rig one on the bottom of the panel - linked up with the TrickleTV relay that powers up everything else. We need to have a positive power indicator.I was glad that I bought this one with the 3D glasses included. The same size unit at the same price, but with many features missing, is sold in local retail stores. It arrived well-packed and was simple to set up.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!!!
Reviews.Author: Steve Rhee
Reviews.Content: Got this as a gift, great value for the price! 3d may be limited to programing, but the picture and sound quality is on par with more expensive brands...The only gripe is that I wish it came with a universal remote...

Reviews.Title: NOT  A GOOD BRAND!!
Reviews.Author: jabias2
Reviews.Content: This television worked for two days and went out. I am not sure about this particular brand. I THINK I WILL STICK TO SAMSUNG.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Charlotte Ward
Reviews.Content: I checked a lot of different TV's in all kinds of stores before ordering this one.  It has a really good picture and great sound for the small price.  I am just a plain TV watcher and don't pay a lot of attention to the "fine" points of the more expensive models  As long as I have a sound that is not "tinny" and a picture that is clear with true colors, I am happy.  The Olympics were a delight to watch this year!

Reviews.Title: The remote control stopped working in 3 months
Reviews.Author: Caroline_Pearl
Reviews.Content: The TV is good. It has very clear pictures, and lots of functions. I use the TV with my new antenna, and I am able to get good digital TV programs. The the remote control is a disappointment. It stopped working in 3 month. I had to buy an universal remote to replace it.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Kervin Francois
Reviews.Content: If you can follow instructions very easy to set up, can even be done without a hand held manual as the TV comes with an on screen manual. My problem is the actual size, it is no where near 50 inches.....not even the frame, unless i was totally misguided by what the size should be...from my measurement the TV is a little below 44 inches from one side to the next in width and the screen is about 43 inches....i'm very disappointed about this and feel very cheated.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: A. Smith
Reviews.Content: We have been very satisfied with thie TV.  The picture is sharp and clear and the sound is just fine.  I've been impressed with the smart features and our family loves being able to project YouTube videos from my iPhone to the TV with a simple push of a button.  No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great price, Great tv.
Reviews.Author: Brian Leduc "B."
Reviews.Content: So far so good it's been 6 months, bright images and easy setup. Purchasing a smart tv is a smart choice!

Reviews.Title: If u can find 1 get 1
Reviews.Author: cep201
Reviews.Content: I LOVE 3D in theaters. I always have from IMAX to recent studio releases. I had owned a Vizio before and you get good value.  Both of these tv's were refurbished.  i have not had any trouble w/them.  no need to buy protection.The 50 inch version of this had everything I was looking for, except access to the web browser. good manufacturer, price, good reviews, 3D. The TV box arrived in an outer box very well packed. The stand did require 2 people and i couldn't wait until my husband returned to put it together. It was awkward but i did it.  i'm a 200 lb woman 5'5".Appearance wise the TV bezel is very thin. Thinner than my 1st vizio.  One of the thinnest I have seen. I didn't think this would be that big a deal but it is nice when viewing not to have too much black around the picture. Speaking of the picture. Right out of the box without any adjustments it was just plain beautiful. The picture brought out new textures and shades I hadn't noticed.The 3D has exceeded my expectations. I love passive 3D. The pictures have been clean and clear and the quality of 3D is theater level. I have watched Iron Man and one of the apps included give you a free look at surfing around some islands.  (i forget which and the name of the movie but it was surreal).  i was like little kid at christmas, getting everythin i wanted. The best home viewing experiences, by far, I have ever had. Passive is much brighter and simpler with very cheap glasses.  you can use the one's you get at the movie theater.  they're no different.3D is available from Netflix.  the set-up is pretty straightforward. The included paper manual gets you just about this far, and then sends you to the electronic manual on the TV.Excellent TV for the price.  and i paid way under $600.

Reviews.Title: DOUBLE THE STARS, IMHO ...
Reviews.Author: JKF
Reviews.Content: My electronics-buff / tv nerd friend who set up this tv (+ the Vizio 5.1 Sound System / 42" sound bar along w/ it) is so impressed w/ it all, that he now wants (& intends to buy) a Vizio Smart TV for himself ~ that's even more of a ringing endorsement than my own, but w/out fail, suffice it to say that this tv is thus far a 10-star purchase for me.The "Leaf Antenna" & the "Vizio 3-D Smart TV QWERTY Keyboard Remote" were also purchased via Amazon ~ no regrets on either, they both deliver as promised.My intensive research & price-comparison shopping paid off ~ I am so happy w/ this right now, only four days into it ...

Reviews.Title: Grate tv
Reviews.Author: Marco Solorio
Reviews.Content: THat is a grate tv, all my family enjoy it. Is a grate experience the 3d so I recommend to see it and cheque this out

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Jessica A. Theall
Reviews.Content: Good picture, easy set up....the only thing I would change is the stand is flimsy, I will end up mounting it in the wall because of this reason

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: chike
Reviews.Content: the picture is clear, i haven't experience any lag and it works great in bright room. the netflix layout is the best i seen and the sound quality is great. this tv is a  must buy.

Reviews.Title: A most have
Reviews.Author: ryan matthews
Reviews.Content: Visio is the only chance you need to make when it comes to buying a tv. Cheap and beautiful quality

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Anthony J
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing. I love it. The picture in both 2D and 3D is great. It has all of the apps I use on my iPad and you get a heck of a deal at this price. I feel like I robbed vizio.

Reviews.Title: couch potato
Reviews.Author: Dave'snotHere
Reviews.Content: Great quality but havent used the 3D yet will have to get back to you on that one. But overall im happy with it.

Reviews.Title: TV Great - Apps are subpar
Reviews.Author: Washerman
Reviews.Content: The TV and picture are 5 stars - but the Apps that come with it are limited to say the least.Vizio has the Skype app preloaded, however you can only use there camera which they do not manufacture anymore.Vizio's customer support says they will no longer be using the Skype app as of next year. Makes sense since theres nocamera for it anyway.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Camraj
Reviews.Content: The picture is great. The 3d is great. I have had this unit for a few months now. It was a great value. Audio is ok.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I've ever owned!
Reviews.Author: thomas prando
Reviews.Content: Amazing smart TV!! So easy to use Netflix, HuluPlus and Amazon Instant Video that I cancelled my cable and I'm going to save $800 this year!! Bye Bye Cable.

Reviews.Title: EXCEEDED EXPECTATIONS!
Reviews.Author: Gregory P Conti
Reviews.Content: Felt compelled to write a review...the entire purchase was fantastic!This Vizio TV was not a "Top Ranked" TV, but am THRILLED I took a chance on it!The picture is incredibly sharp and vibrant and the sound from the speakers is surprisingly very good! 3D quality is very good as well, and no "Blurring" has been eperienced!Overall value of this TV (Price VS Performance) is EXCELLENT!

Reviews.Title: Great slim HDTv
Reviews.Author: ML
Reviews.Content: Great Hd 50" Lightweight 3d Built in surround sound, multiple picture settings, wifi ,smart Dimming High quality item. Speed!!!!Fast shipment

Reviews.Title: This tv is amazing!
Reviews.Author: Andrew James Camenga
Reviews.Content: This tv is amazing for the price! When setting up, I was concerned because I read in the manual that you can't play videos through the usb with an external hard drive, but I tried it and it works! The picture is amazing along with the sound. The ONLY drawback that I noticed is that the power cord is rather short so be careful where you decide to put it unless you want to use an extension cord.

Reviews.Title: Great TV but you may have to update ( replace ) devices connected to it.
Reviews.Author: J. Weber
Reviews.Content: The TV has a great picture and sound is pretty good for todays flat screens ( no room for decent size speakers and most of them point towards  the wall ). The speakers on this unit appear to be projecting out of the bottom , giving it better sound than some other tvs . I enjoy the smart tv apps . It is great to be able to watch Netflix without having to turn on another device. Also when watching Netflix the remote operates like the one on your dvd player. There is a optional remote you can buy that may make your smart tv searches easier, it  looks just like the standard remote but it has a keyboard on the back ( it cost about $17 delivered ) . The Item that causes me to give this a 4 instead of 5 is the lack of input jacks for other items .other than the newest with HDMI. There is only one component input ( on the back ) and no vga ( used on computers ). I use my computer to record tv and watch recorded tv on my monitor ( tv ). I have found a dvi to hdmi adaptor cable witch allows me to put video into the tv from the computer but not audio. I have to turn on a separate unit to hear sound. My previous Vizio had a audio input right next to the hdmi input.The delivery with Amazon Prime Was great, two days just like advertised ! The TV box was inside another box with packing all around, so the TV arrived safe and sound.Just in case you are unfamiliar with 3D, this TV will not work on 3D unless you have a 3D player, a 3D movie, and 3D glasses (2 are included).

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Michael Eldridge "mike"
Reviews.Content: picture is great and lots of great apps.  great TV for the price.  compared this TV to several others locally and this TV is great

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: David Schoenberger
Reviews.Content: What a great TV and such a great price. Amazon is #1. I have looked around at alot of other places and nobody comes close to beating and being a prime member makes it even better.

Reviews.Title: Killer TV
Reviews.Author: nate
Reviews.Content: Of course the TV arrived well before the estimated shipping date, but the set has offered so much more after that. After messing with the recommended settings that one can find on the internet I have found this television to perform equally as well as a model priced 30% more. It has a slim profile, perfect for a wall mount. It has all of the inputs and outputs that it advertises. The built in speakers sound great if this is the sound option people want to use. The quality of the 3D is subject to the original 3D quality. I have not extensively tested it and will provide a future update. I absolutely love my new television and am glad i purchased this model. I plan on buying a second one because it is such a great TV.

Reviews.Title: Weary at first, but thankful in the end.
Reviews.Author: Mason
Reviews.Content: After reading some of these reviews, it leaves the potential buyer a little skeptical. But after many days of hesitation, I broke down and made the purchase. And I am 100 percent satisfied with this tv. The tv goes hand in hand with my ps3, apple tv, and dish receiver. The actual on screen apps are very solid as well, but if I am already using my ps3, I just launch netflix from there to save time.The 3D effect on this tv is outstanding. There are no controls to alter the 3D, but there is no need for any. The picture is perfect without them. I immediately purchased Iron Man 3 on 3D Blu Ray and was absolutely blown away. For the price you pay for this tv, it is absolutely incredible. I would recommend to every single person I know.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: D. Keehn "Angelinmypocket"
Reviews.Content: The tv works great has a beautiful picture and was well pleased with the price for. 3d television.  Can't wait to get the direct Tv hooked up for bigger variety and hd programming.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Jeffery K. Hilburger "Keurig Jockey"
Reviews.Content: Great picture and ok sound.I have a Roku Internet box and the VIZIO internet Apps I have used just don't measure up very well.The interface is clunky for HuluPlus and Amazon instant Video. Much easier getting the Shows I want to watch using the Roku.My Amazon Watch List does not show up using the Vizio App.The streaming video freezes a lot using the Vizio but not when using the Roku on the same show , day and time.We watched a Free 3D movie using the 3DGO App that just released on this Vizio model and it was excellent.Have not yet tried a Blueray 3D yet.This is a great TV for the Price. The internet Apps are ok but If you want good internet TV  get a ROKU box.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV with a Perfect Price
Reviews.Author: Toebe Fremin
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  It is the perfect size for my shelf to handle.  You have to have the TV at eye level and be sitting direct in front of it to get the full 3D effects.  Make sure you stand or setup will do that before ordering.  I am lucky that my self is fully adjustable.

Reviews.Title: Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: Webbedfoot
Reviews.Content: Very good picture a d controls. it was fast and easy to setup. Price on sale was an added bonus.

Reviews.Title: Good tv great picture
Reviews.Author: Julito bling bling
Reviews.Content: This tv is awesome its inexpensive great image quality even comparing to my larger sharp aquos 240 hz tv . The apps work well pretty quick and pain free as well as setup was very easy. I dislike the remote and have upgraded to a logitech harmony remote. Other than that the only drawback is that its a little thicker than most led tvs.I would recomend it if u care about a bery good deep image for a good price plus its 3d and movie theatre glasses work great

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money and size
Reviews.Author: M. Tan
Reviews.Content: Purchased this when my Samsung 50" plasma had it's capacitor repaired.  The VIZIO, being 3D capable, also plays a lot nicer with the rest of the 3D components of my AV system (Onkyo TX-NR 5010 split dual HDMI Outs paired with an Epson 3020e Projector).  Great picture and is much thinner bezel.  Probably 75lbs lighter as well.  Motion is smooth and fluid without the "soap opera" effect many of the newer tv's with motion smoothing cause.  3D glasses are passive (just like the movie theaters), which is nice, but we tend to watch 3D content on the projector so it's not as big of an issue.

Reviews.Title: GREAT television for a GREAT price
Reviews.Author: Happy Heart
Reviews.Content: Though my husband was really hoping for a 60-inch screen, we simply could not pass up the great deal we got on this Vizio.  It has a very clear picture and superb sound. It is our first "smart" tv, and we have enjoyed watching movies from Netflix and Amazon Prime videos.Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Good overall for the price, the sound is horrible
Reviews.Author: RichardBoner
Reviews.Content: I would give it 5 stars but the sound is horrible. I replaced an old Poloroid 46 inch TV with this and the Poloroid had better sound. I guess most manufacturers now a days are doing this on purpose to force you to buy their sound bars and etc. This TV is extremely light, we bought a mount that was meant for 37-55 inch TV's but I feel fairly confident that a mount meant for smaller TVs could have been used. The picture quality is OK, I think Samsung still look much better. My friends Samsung does the 120hz and with that, you can see more detail, I don't get that affect with this Vizio TV though, even though it is 120hz. I'm not taking anyth stars off for that though, because it might be some setting that I haven't discovered yet, or maybe his only displays that way because of a special setting he has on his Samsung, that Vizio TV lacks. I know 120hz should allow me to view more frames, however, I don't see the difference like he does, using the same input hardware (a PS3 with HDMI). The 3D is cool, but it seems like that trend is starting to die out again, so there isn't much out there to watch in 3D.

Reviews.Title: Logging-out of YouTube requires factory reset
Reviews.Author: steven
Reviews.Content: Price and features made this an attractive purchase and worthy of five stars. However, I gave it four stars after contacting Vizio Customer Support when I was unable to log-out of the YouTube application. The instructions for logging-out of the YouTube application -- as well as Netflix and other accounts that require login -- is to reset the TV to its factory defaults. Ultimately, this isn't a deal-breaker and I think 4.5 stars is a more accurate rating for this product. But the inability to log-out of an application is a fairly obvious oversight for any device, especially a shared device like a TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Value
Reviews.Author: S. Furlong "luvtomeeturfeet"
Reviews.Content: This 50" 3D LED HDTV looks great! Upgraded from 720p lcd 32", and the difference is night and day.  Watched The Adventures of Tintin last night, and the 3D looked amazing (better than my active shutter glasses on my computer, as well as the theater projection movies).  Another plus that I liked was that it is able to pass-through 5.1 hdmi digital audio signals via the optical out port to my external speaker unit. My previous tv would convert it to stereo only. It also has audio return via hdmi should I need it with a receiver in the future.  The wireless N internet is very fast with no stuttering while streaming HD video. My only gripe was the amazon prime video app takes around 15 seconds to start up and doesn't have a few features like recently watched shows or auto-play next episodes.  You have to search for each show you want to watch.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Easy
Reviews.Content: Not only is the 3D imagery top notch, but the overall performance of this set is highly impressive. I am happy to add to the high marks that it has already received by other owners for it is well deserved. I'll break it down into a Pros and Cons to keep it simple:)Pros:Crisp and clear images in all lights and viewing anglesSound quality from internal speakers rivals some sound bars3-D Imagery is amazing. (Kids really loved Pacific Rim) As good, if not better than the theater:)Smart TV technology has just about anything you could want or expect it to do,Shipping speed and packaging were top notch (UPS was troubling)Cons:None for the TVUPS delivered it standing on one end!! A big NO NO for a set of this size:( Box was clearly marked as to how it was to be handled, but was ignored) Dodged the bullet and all was well, except for the stroke I had when I saw what they had done:)Used the following mount for it and the install went smooth: Cheetah Mounts Plasma LCD Flat Screen TV Articulating Full Motion Dual Arm Wall Mount Bracket For 32-65"

Reviews.Title: Slow Wireless
Reviews.Author: Judy Alonso
Reviews.Content: Wireless streaming is slower than my last tv.  But still great picture quality and many extra features included.  Good buy

Reviews.Title: Can't ask for more for the price
Reviews.Author: sevnup
Reviews.Content: This is a great, affordable 3D HDTV offering excellent picture quality above all else.----------------Picture QualityLED with local dimming. Vizio calls and markets it as "Smart Dimming." I notice the effect sometimes when the scene changes quickly, though I leave it on simply because I like the deeper blacks. The colors are vibrant and fantastic with a bit of tweaking.Although I'm unable to get a straight answer, this TV is likely not a full array LED. The viewing angle on this TV isn't anything to brag about either.BuildThe thin frame really makes the picture stand out. The TV is also surprisingly light. I was able to handle it, lift it up, and move around by myself.SoundNot much to talk about here. Didn't get this TV for the sound but I didn't find it terrible or too much of a "thin" sound. Hooked it up to my Vizio soundbar and it worked almost flawlessly. One issue I had is after hooking it up to the soundbar I noticed that the audio went out of sync. I was surprised to find an audio delay setting in the menu which easily fixed the problem (I had to crank it up to 3).3DI tested a variety of sources, including Bluray 3D, Netflix 3D, 3D Youtube videos, and 3D movies from the PC. All worked great! I noticed a lot of ghosting/crosstalk at first, but I realized I had to be positioned just about center and eye level with the TV to eliminate the issues.AppsI've only extensively tried Netflix and Youtube and both work great. Using the remote to type is very difficult and annoying. Luckily, I can control my list for Netflix on a PC and pair my smartphone to the TV for Youtube for easy navigation (the smartphone app can get a bit buggy sometimes).I couldn't confirm it online anywhere, but the Netflix app on this TV offers both SUPERHD and 3D! And the Netflix app is fully fleshed out with profiles and the kids version.I also set up the Amazon app, but it seems severely underdeveloped and unintuitive.----------------If you're budget-minded and in the market for an excellent 2D HDTV that offers a decent 3D picture and Smart TV capabilities, this TV is probably one of the best at the moment.

Reviews.Title: Internet connection works great, Amazon videos play over WiFI with no problems
Reviews.Author: j marcus hollis
Reviews.Content: I would definitely buy this product again. Internet connection works great, Amazon videos play over WiFI with no problems, Have not tried 3d movie yet but looks great in 2d.  Had 50" sharp previously that failed immediately after warranty expired.

Reviews.Title: I am very impressed with this E500d-A0 TV.
Reviews.Author: Mr D
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv Tuesday night and it arrived Thursday for the Amazon Prime cost of  628.00. Wow I didn't expect it to be this nice. To my 51 year old eyes the screen looks perfect. The colors, sharpness,brightness, and uniformity all look right on. It was a breeze to hook up the wifi and Amazon and Netflix both stream effortlessly. I also like the fact that is  the same size as the 46 Samsung it replaces.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Naterz
Reviews.Content: Have owned a 50 inch  Panasonic Viera Plasma for years, loved the picture quality but it died on us, we were shopping around and heard really good reviews about Vizio and I have watched them get more and more attention over the years and also have grown into and awesome company that make some really sweet Tvs, the picture is amazingly good with no screen drag at all.  the 3d is really good as well.  I am super picky when it comes to Led or lcd tvs the screens just drive me nuts with all the dragging but this one has none of that feels like i am watching a nice plasma screen.

Reviews.Title: Nothing but trouble
Reviews.Author: pat
Reviews.Content: I have had a variety of problems with this TV, on my 3rd TV in 2 weeks. The first TV had some sort of power issue and shut down randomly. The second TV had a wireless network connectivity issue. The 3rd TV seems to have worse wireless connectivity issues than the second one. Several other wireless devices I own work flawlessly much farther from the router.Each TV has had different speaker volume levels and the volume level adjustment software doesn't work well. The web apps are designed for a giant TV, even with a 50 inch screen the movie descriptions are too small too reed from 10 feet away.Screen quality, brightness, and resolution are fine, and I like the slim bezel, other than that it is piece of junk.Amazon customer service has been excellent, although at this point I am done.

Reviews.Title: Cannot Recommend this HDTV
Reviews.Author: Sallan513
Reviews.Content: Lasted one day before I was rewarded with an extremely loud pop and then it was totally dead.  Extremely difficult return due to UPS and size of box.  Amazon Customer Service was awesome throughout the entire process for the return.

Reviews.Title: 3D TV
Reviews.Author: Muriel Johnson
Reviews.Content: Never thought I would like 3d movies but I love it.  The Smart TV is also great, must say I am learning to work it now so I am not probably taking full advantage of everything.

Reviews.Title: Good brand...
Reviews.Author: Curtis K. Davis
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend on my account, and the are satisfied with it, just as I am satisfied with the 60" from the same brand that I purchased.

Reviews.Title: After a few glitches, very pleased with the TV
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: the "smart" aspect of this TV suck. The wifi worked just fine for about a month then one day just kept cutting out. now it will not connect to my WIFI.  My wifi is streaming at 22mps for all my other devices so its definitely the TV. No help from their customer service except to take it off my wall and send it in.  First and last Vizio that i will ever purchase.  As for the TV, it works just fine, not as sharp as my Samsung but it does the trick for everything else that i need.  I bought it for the internet access so for me its a real disappointment.  I did my research prior to purchase so it is possible that i just got a bad tv but overall i can not recommend the product.Edited 10/23/13  I changed routers and the internet now streams at 7mps +.  Perhaps Vizio was just not compatible with my previous router. Since I changed routers, the "smart" aspects of my tv now work just fine. I WOULD recommend this TV.  So, I am changing my review to 5 stars as I am now very happy with my Vizio TV!

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv because I have been very happy with my vizio that I have in my bedroom, plus I really wanted the 3D capability. During setup we noticed that the stand is very wobbly and it seems like the TV is going to fall over. After two days of having the tv the picture started flickering and anytime you pull a menu up even if its less than 30 seconds, it burns into the screen. We are have sent for a replacement, hoping the next one will be better

Reviews.Title: Gamers tv
Reviews.Author: J. Reynolds
Reviews.Content: This tv was purchased for my son's to play their Xbox / Wii games...it is a nice tv, with a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Subpar at Best
Reviews.Author: E. Lyons
Reviews.Content: The picture on this TV looked really nice for about an hour, but once I started watching different things I started to realize that the picture is well below average. I watch a lot of soccer, and I play a lot of FIFA on my Xbox. The main problem I've had is that when the camera pans the width of the field there is serious motion blur. I also feel like nothing is ever in focus with this TV, everything seems to be blurry if there is even the slightest bit of motion. The other problem I have is that when the there is motion I can also see a gray haze in different areas. I'm assuming this is caused by the LEDs, but it's very annoying (I'm actually watching hockey as I'm typing this and the gray haze and motion blur are ridiculously noticeable). I've also had serious issues with tiling that I wouldn't expect from a 120hz refresh rate. I did an online chat with Vizio customer service and their recommendations helped slightly but there are still serious problems with my TV. Based on other people's reviews I may have a defective set, but Vizio customer service didn't mention anything about it.I also have a 5-year old 37in Samsung LCD that has a better picture than this TV with none of the motion blur or the gray hazy areas. Over the past 5 years if anyone asked me what brand to look at for a TV I would always recommend Samsung. I made the mistake of not listening to my own recommendation. My mom has a 55in Panasonic Viera plasma TV, and I wish I had saved my money for one of those or a Samsung. I would not recommend this TV to anyone. Save your money and get a Samsung or a Viera plasma.

Reviews.Title: Power On!
Reviews.Author: LUVS2Shopp
Reviews.Content: I really like this tv but it takes forever to power on..Is anyone else having this problem?I don't see a setting to adjust how long it takes the tv to power on.

Reviews.Title: 3D problems with Netflix
Reviews.Author: ABDULLAH AL-FALAH
Reviews.Content: the netflix 3D movies are not plying as the LG .. i think this TV has an issue with the 3Dnot happy with it

Reviews.Title: Didn't work out for us
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: We returned two of these tv's.  The first one seemed bad from the start.  The audio and video did not keep up with each other.  The second one seemed better at first but soon developed the same problem.  We couldnt figure out what it was, but it happened whether we were streaming, watching a DVD or just watching cable TV. We returned the second for a refund and are planning to buy a different brand.

Reviews.Title: The TV was damaged upon arrival.
Reviews.Author: Lynda L Ollinger
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately the TV was damaged beyond repair when we received it.  So I had to send it back.  Will definately purchase a Vizio to replace the damaged one.  We've had good luck with them, love the smart tv feature, and will buy again.

Reviews.Title: A waste of money!!!
Reviews.Author: F. Garcia "loverboy58"
Reviews.Content: This Flat TV is a waste of money. First of all the apps that come with the TV are worthless. No web browser where you can surf the net or read emails. LG's and Samsung's have better apps than this TV. I have a 5 year old flat LCD and the quality of that TV is better than the picture quality of the e500d-a0. My wife purchased this piece of junk as a Christmas present for me and we started arguing because there are better Flat TV's in the market for the same price. I am hoping for this one to get mess up so that I can return it for a better unit. I still cannot find a pro in this TV. All I have is cons because there is nothing appealing to me from this unit. Don't waste your money
